briefTitle: Quality of Life Analysis of Arimidex Treatment in Postmenopausal Patients With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Quality of Life Analysis of Arimidex Treatment in Postmenopausal Patients With Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Elements of the investigator questionnaire SF RAND-36 questionnaire
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Provision of informed consent
* Postmenopausal, hormon receptor positive patients with early breast cancer treated with Arimidex
* Investigators are requested to recruit patients only with at least 1 month prior Arimidex treatment.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Allergy to substance of medication
* Pre-perimenopausal woman
* Woman not eligible for treatment
